INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:

I grew up on a farm, and have worked in and around the  healthcare field for nearly 20 years, therefore I have a unique perspective to bring to STEM and CTE. I am excited to see what I can bring to this externship and what I can bring from my experience back into my high school classroom!
